The Oblitercons/Koga 
Shuko/Unitron/Smokescreen/Beachcomber/Hades/Anubis/Serpentor:



Shuko grunted as shots dug into his heavily armored body.  Raising his rifle, 
he fired three laser shots off at Shadow Wing.  <All forces, FULL RETREAT!  
Dieties, provide cover fire!  Mercenaries, cover fire!  MOVE!>

---

Serpentor raised his launcher, firing a blast off at the Ark, beginning to 
fall back slightly.

---

Hades stumbled back from shots, watching Anubis backflip, a few shots digging 
into his heavily armored chest.  Both raising their weapons, Hades fired four 
laser blasts from his rifle, Anubis firing three plasma blasts and two optic 
blasts, all shots heading for Sniper.

---

Pyro reached his brothers, as did Scavenger, despite shots being fired on 
them.  Dark One sidestepped, as did Hiss, avoiding shots.

"That's it!  These Maximal dogs will tremble now!  Form Oblitertron!" Dark 
One yelled, leaping into the air, taking the shape of a pelvis, torso, and 
head.  Breakdown leapt into the air, taking form of a left arm and attaching 
to Dark One.  Pyro, despite his wounds, went into the air, forming into a 
right arm and attaching to Dark One.  Hiss transformed into a left leg, 
attaching ot Dark One.  Scavenger became a right leg after leaping into the 
air, attaching to Dark One.  Smashing into the ground was a 50 ft high 
behemoth.  "WE LIVE FOR OBLITERATION." the large robot bellowed, Dark One in 
control and remembering who had attacked them, despite the pathetic treaty.  
Reaching into subspace, the large robot pulled out its relatively large laser 
pistol (relative to the size of a regular Maximal or Predacon's laser pistol, 
since it's a laser pistol for a 50 ft high robot).  Raising the pistol, with 
a quick aim, Oblitertron pulled the trigger, launching a powerful and 
relatively large laser bolt out at Tavatron.  Firing an optic blast off at 
Shadow Cat, preparing to engage further.

---

Koga Shuko looked to Oblitertron, squeezing his hand into a fist.  "That's my 
technology!  Serpentor, take that GESTALT DOWN NOW!" Koga Shuko yelled, 
knowing only fresh troops could stop him, not his mangled warriors.  The 
Dieties had been beaten.  He sighed.  <RETREAT!  RETREAT!  GET TO THE SHIP!  
DIETIES AND MERCS, COVER FIRE!  RETREAT!!!> he screamed madly, running, 
Serpentor firing off a plasma blast from his launcher at Oblitertron's chest 
before running after Shuko.

---

Beachcomber and Smokescreen came out of the Ark, seeing the large gestalt 
firing on Maximals.  "Slag..."

Smokescreen saw BH and Blastrage's skimmer opening fire with its 10X grenade 
launcher.  "We better take that out before it damages the Ark, that large 
robot won't be here for a few cycles, that thin will!" Smokescreen said, 
raising his electro-distruptor rifle, firing five bolts off at the Skimmer's 
engines.  

Beachcomber took out his missile launcher, firing off the one and only rocket 
in it off at the skimmer.        

---

Unitron stopped, seeing Beachcomber and Smokescreen firing on the mercenaries 
Master Shuko had hired.  Raising his rifles, he fired four bolts each, 
running past the Maximals as they dropped to the ground.  Unitron heard the 
call for retreat, and headed after Shuko.
